title: Paredes
body: A populated place in the parish of Arco da Calheta. The chapel of Nossa Senhora da Nazaré, which is located there, was erected in the last quarter of the 17th century by Francisco de Barros Maciel, and was completely rebuilt in the year 1830 by António João Barbosa de Matos e Camara, a descendant of the founder. It is a vincular institution, of which the aforementioned Francisco de Barros Maciel was the first administrator.

Francisco de Barros Maciel: Founder of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Nazaré

XVII: Construction of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Nazaré
1830: Reconstruction of the chapel of Nossa Senhora da Nazaré
